text: The 1905 Case football team represented the Case School of Applied Science in the American city of Cleveland, Ohio, now a part of Case Western Reserve University, during the 1905 college football season. The team's coach was Joseph Wentworth.http://athletics.case.edu/sports/spartan_club/bios/wentworth_joe Case won its fourth consecutive Ohio Athletic Conference title. The annual rivalry game featured coaches Joseph Wentworth and Paul Jones ==Schedule== ==References== Case Category:Case Western Reserve Spartans football seasons Case Football
title: 1905 Case football team
